data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Test::Reporter provides a programatic interface by which CPAN
    Testers or users of CPANPLUS are able to submit distribution test
    results to the CPAN testing service. This distribution provides
    functionality similar to that of the cpantest script and is intended
    for use in situations where using cpantest is not appropriate, or
    ideal. This distribution is released with the blessing of Kirrily
    "Skud" Robert, who is the author of the non-functional
    CPAN::Test::Reporter distribution.
